decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - A. Details of the display installation start date shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority prior to the installation of the shroud advertisement. The commencement of the shroud advertisement installation shall only be within 12 months of the date of this consent.   

B. The installation of shroud advertisement is permitted on a temporary basis for the
duration of a maximum of 6 months from the approved installation date under Part A of this condition. The shroud advertisement hereby permitted shall not be displayed until all the scaffold is in place and shall be removed when the scaffold is removed or within 6 months from the approved installation date, whichever is the sooner.

Reason: The advertisement is only acceptable for a limited period, having regard to the amenity of the area in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (adopted July 2023) and the requirements of paragraph 137 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2023.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed PY4527/001, PY4527/002, PY4527/004 rev A, PY4527/005 rev B, PY4527/007 rev B.
Reason: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme.

Condition : 3 - The area of the inset advertising shall not exceed 9.2m x 2.5m and shall
always form part of the larger shroud advertisement hereby permitted for the
duration of the display. 
Reason: To ensure the sign does not have an adverse effect on the amenity
of the area in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Wandsworth Local
Plan 2023 and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy
Framework 2021.

Condition : 4 - No floodlighting, security lighting or other external means of illumination of the advertisement shall be provided or installed. .
Reason: In the interest of highway safety and of the visual amenities of the locality in accordance with Council policy LP9 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023 and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy 
Framework 2021.
description: Temporary decorative scaffold wrap printed onto pvc incorporating an inset advertising area measuring 9.2 X 2.5 meters for 6 months within A 1:1 image of building facade
